column2: "Na ɔbarimba bi wɔ Kaesarea a ne dzin dze Kornelius
column3: ɔyɛ ɔhamupanyin wɔ asafokuw a wɔfrɛ no Italiafo dze no mu
column5: "nyimpa nyamesuronyi a ɔnye ne fifo nyina suro Nyankopɔn na ɔyɛ adɔyɛ pii ma nkorɔfo
column6: na ɔyɛ nkotoserɛ asɔr ma Nyankopɔn daa."

column2: "Na ohun n'enyido adze petee bɛyɛ ndɔnebiasa no mu dɛ Nyankopɔn bɔfoe baa ne nkyɛn na ɔbɛsee no dɛ
column3: Kornelius."

column2: "Na ɔhwɛɛ no hann no
column3: na hu kaa no no
column6: ebɛnadze a? Na ɔsee no dɛ
column7: wo mpaabɔ nye w'adɔyɛ no aba sor abɛyɛ nkaa wɔ Nyankopɔn enyim."

column2: "Na afei soma mbarimba ma wɔnkɔ Jopa nkehyia Simon a wɔfrɛ no Peter no:"
"ɔsoɛ Simon a ɔyɛ nwomahyɛfo bi a ne fie wɔ mpoano no hɔ."
"Na bɔfo no a ɔkasaa kyerɛɛ no no kɔree no
column3: ɔfrɛɛ no nkowaa beenu nye sordaanyi nyamesuronyi bi a ofi hɔn a wɔsom no daa no mu."

column2: "Na ɔkaa nsɛm no nyina kyerɛɛ hɔn no
column3: ɔsomaa hɔn wɔ Jopa."

column2: "Na adze kyee no
column3: ber a wɔnam kwan do rebɛn kurow no
column4: Peter kɔr dan no etsifi kɔbɔɔ mpaa bɛyɛ ewiaber duebien no mu;"

column2: "na ɔkɔm dzee no
column3: na ɔpɛɛ dɛ odzidzi: na wogu do reyɛ edziban ama no no
column4: n'enyiwa wiaa no ma ɔkɔr tsebea fofor mu."

column2: "Iyi mu na ohun dɛ sor ebue
column3: na adze bi fir sor risian a ɔtse dɛ abradaa kɛse a wɔakyekyer no etwaanan

column2: "no mu na asaase mbowa a wotsia ntwɛrnan
column3: nye hɔn a wɔweawea
column4: nye wimu ntumbowa nyina bi wɔ."

column2: "Na ndze bi baa no hɔ dɛ
column3: Peter

column2: "Na Peter see dɛ
column3: Dabida
column5: osiandɛ minndzii biribi a ɔyɛ ekyiwadze anaadɛ no ho nntsew da."

column2: "Na ndze no baa no hɔ bio ne mprɛnu dɛ
column3: Dza Nyankopɔn asan ho no

column2: "Na wɔyɛɛ yi mprɛnsa
column3: na wɔfaa adze no kɔr sor bio."

column2: "Na ber Peter rodwendwen enyido adze a ohunii no ho no
column3: hwɛ
column4: nna mbarimba a Kornelius somaa hɔn no ebisabisa Simon fie kwan ebegyinagyina abowano"

column2: "refrɛ
column3: na woribisa dɛ Simon a wɔfrɛ no Peter soɛ hɔ anaa?"

column2: "Na Peter rodwendwen enyido adzehu no ho no
column3: Sunsum no see no dɛ

column2: "Na soɛr sian nye hɔn nkɔ
column3: mma ɔnnyɛ wo konsee

column2: "Na Peter sianee kɔr mbarimba no nkyɛn
column3: na ɔsee dɛ
column4: Emi nye nyia hom rohwehwɛ no no: ebɛnadze ntsi na hom bae?"

column2: "Na wɔsee dɛ
column3: Ɔhamupanyin Kornelius
column5: na ɔwɔ dzin pa wɔ Jewfo man nyina mu no
column6: na bɔfo krɔnkrɔn beyii kyerɛɛ no dɛ ombehyia wo nkɔ ne fie

column2: "Na ɔfrɛɛ hɔn baa dan mu
column3: na ɔsoom hɔn hɔho. Na adze kyee no Peter nye hɔn fii hɔ kɔree
column4: na enuanom a wofi Jopa no bi kegyaa no."

column2: "Na adze kyee no wodur Kaesarea. Nna Kornelius rotweɔn hɔn
column3: na ɔafrɛ n'ebusuafo nye n'anyɛnkofo a wɔbɛn aboa ano."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ Peter rehɛn fie no mu no
column3: nna Kornelius kehyiaa no hwee n'ananadze kotoow no."

column2: "Na Peter maa no do see no dɛ
column3: Soɛr: na mo so meyɛ nyimpa."

column2: "Na ɔnye no rekasa no
column3: ɔkɔr fie no mu kohun nyimpa pii a woehyia;"

column2: "na ɔsee hɔn dɛ
column3: Hom nyim mbrɛ Jewnyi nnyi ho kwan dɛ ɔdze noho kɔbɔ ɔnanaben ho
column4: anaadɛ ɔkɔ ne nkyɛn; naaso Nyankopɔn akyerɛ me dɛ mma memmfrɛ nyimpa biara ekyiwadze anaadɛ no ho nntsew:"

column2: "ntsi na hom somae ma wobehyiaa me no
column3: mennyiyi ano
column4: na maba yi. Nkyii mibisa hom asɛm kor a ɔnam do ma hom behyiaa me."

column2: "Na Kornelius see dɛ
column3: Ndaanan nye yi
column5: nna mowɔ me fie ha ara reyɛ ewiaber ndɔnebiasa asɔr no
column7: ɔbarimba bi begyinaa m'enyim hyɛ atar hyerɛnn
column11: wɔatse w'asɔr na wɔakaa w'adɔyɛ no wɔ Nyankopɔn enyim."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi
column3: soma ma wɔnkɔ Jopa nkehyia Simon a wɔsan so frɛ no Peter no: ɔsoɛ Simon nwomahyɛfo no fie wɔ mpoano."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi ntsɛmara mosomae ma wɔbaa wo nkyɛn; na wo so ayɛ no yie dɛ aba. Ntsi nkyii hɛn nyina ehyia wɔ Nyankopɔn enyim ha dɛ yeribetsie dza Nyankopɔn ahyɛ wo nyina."
"Na Peter buee n'ano see dɛ: Nokwar ara mehu dɛ Nyankopɔn nnhwɛ nyimpa enyim:"
"na mbom ɔman biara mu nyia osuro no na ɔyɛ ndzeyɛtsenenee no
column3: ɔpɛ dɛ ɔgye no."

column2: "Asɛm no a ɔsomae brɛɛ Israelmba ma ɔkaa asomdwee a ɔnam Jesus Kraest do ho asɛmpa no (ɔno nye nyimpa nyina wura)"
"homara hom nyim asɛm a wɔdze tahyee Judea nyina a ɔhyɛɛ ase wɔ Galilii wɔ enuma a John kae no ekyir:"
"mekyerɛ Jesus a ofi Nazarɛt
column3: mbrɛ Nyankopɔn dze Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn nye ahoɔdzen seraa no
column5: na ɔyɛɛ hɔn a abɔnsam dzi hɔn do tum no nyina edur

column2: "Na hɛn nye adasefo wɔ ndzɛmba a ɔyɛe wɔ Jewfo asaase do nye Jerusalɛm mu no ho; ɔno so na wɔsɛɛn no wɔ dua do kum no."
"Na Nyankopɔn nyaan no da a otsia ebiasa no mu
column3: na oyii no kyerɛɛ petee
column6: na dasefo a Nyankopɔn eyi ato hɔ dada no a
column7: hɛn a ɔsoɛree fii ewufo mu no ekyir no yɛnye no dzidzii nomee no."

column2: "Na ɔhyɛɛ hɛn dɛ yɛnka nkyerɛ ɔman no
column3: na yendzi dase dɛ ɔno nye nyia Nyankopɔn ahyɛ no atseasefo nye ewufo ɔtsɛmbuafo."

column2: "Ɔno na nkɔnhyɛfo nyina dzi no dase dɛ obiara a ɔbɛgye no edzi no ɔnam ne dzin mu benya bɔnfakyɛ."
"Na Peter da do reka nsɛm yi no
column3: Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no boguu hɔn a wɔtsee asɛm no nyina do."

column2: "Na agyedzifo a wofi etwatsiafo no mu a wɔnye Peter bae no ho boow hɔn dɛ woehue Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no akyɛdze no egu amanamamfo so do."
"Na wɔtsee dɛ wɔrekasa kasa fofor
column3: na woriyi Nyankopɔn ayɛw. Nna Peter buae see dɛ
column5: "Aso obi botum esiw nsu ho kwan dɛ wonnkonuma yinom a woenya Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no dɛ hɛnara so yi?"

column2: "Na ɔhyɛɛ dɛ wonnuma hɔn wɔ Jesus Kraest ne dzin mu. Nna wɔserɛɛ no dɛ ɔntsena hɔn nkyɛn nda kakra."
